summary.description: > VERY_LOW CONFIDENCE! | > HOMEPAGE MISSING! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'Rangatiratanga Maori self-determination Whanau', 'Tino Rangatiratanga Maori self-determination Whanau', 'Maori homelessness', 'Maori self-determination Whanau Ora' | A principles framework for taking action on Māori/Indigenous Homelessness in Aotearoa/New Zealand | Objective:The objective of this research was to develop a principles framework to guide action on Māori Indigenous homelessness in Aotearoa incorporating Rangatiratanga (Māori self-determination), Whānau Ora (Government policy that places Māori families at the center of funding, policy and services) and Housing First
summary.name: Rangatiratanga Maori self-determination Whanau Ora
